price: Mi ćemo poslati kamilu da bismo ih iskušali, pa pričekaj ih i budi strpljiv.
arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā mur'silū al-nāqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-iṣ'ṭabir
